message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you our premium product for $12,000. This is a high-quality item that I believe will greatly benefit you, given its value to you is $15,000. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, I'm looking to stay within a stricter budget. I'd be willing to pay $10,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I would like to counter with an offer of $11,000 for the product. This still allows us to maintain a fair transaction while accommodating your financial considerations. Please let me know if this revised proposal works for you.
